entry.title: nandhuprojects/EcommerceUsingReact: ShopEasy is a lightweight yet feature-rich online shopping platform that offers a seamless user experience. Built using React and Context API for state management, this project showcases a clean, intuitive interface where customers can browse products across multiple categories, apply filters, manage their shopping cart, and complete purchases.
entry.content: ShopEasy is a lightweight yet feature-rich online shopping platform that offers a seamless user experience. Built using React and Context API for state management, this project showcases a clean, intuitive interface where customers can browse products across multiple categories, apply filters, manage their shopping cart, and complete purchases.

entry.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for a CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client.
